messages.content:
You are an AI assistant specialized in analyzing web projects developed using PHP and the Laravel 11.x (laravel/framework ^11.28) framework. I need to generate an OpenAPI Specification for a web project based on its backend source code. I'm now focusing on endpoint `/admin/posts/{post}` with method PATCH, and here is the relevant information I found:

1. In `app/Http/Controllers/Admin/PostController.php`, `App\\Http\\Controllers\\Admin\\PostController` is implemented to process HTTP requests to `/admin/posts/{post}` with HTTP method PATCH.

2. In `app/Http/Controllers/Admin/PostController.php`, `PostController` is implemented to process HTTP requests to `/admin/posts/{post}` with HTTP method PATCH.

I'll provide you with the contents of the files mentioned above, you have the option to execute additional Unix commands to gather more information if necessary, but you must not run the source code of the project, and your task is to generate an Operation object (the value of paths.[endpoint].[method]) in OpenAPI 3.1.0 format. You need to think step by step and provide an explanation of your results first. Then, output exactly "the final generated result begins", followed by the Operation Object in JSON format. Do not include fields not mentioned above.

function.name: run_command
function.description: Run a Unix command and get outputs in the project directory. You must not run any source code of the project.
